item.title: Acolytes of the Machine & Other Gaming Stories, by Mary Crowell
item.description:
Acolytes of the Machine & Other Gaming Stories, by Mary Crowell

Acolytes of the Machine & Other Gaming Stories by Mary Crowell, released 01 October 2012 1. Massacre Anne 2. Devil of Stories: The Dance of Moxie & Mathias I 3. City of Doors 4. A Balleto for Rupus 5. I Put My Low Stat 6. Just Dessert: The Dance of Moxie & Mathias II 7.

item.title: WhoDrewThis on DeviantArt
item.description:
WhoDrewThis on DeviantArt

And I am out of said game. Like, literally. I haven't touched my tablet to do actual art in months. But all is not bleak at the Multipex. I am here, now, officially letting folks know they can use my art for whatever- home games, commercial art, whatever.

item.title: Dr. Who Meets Metal
item.description:
Dr. Who Meets Metal

Hey guys, So I saw this EVERYWHERE haha. I included the "I am the Doctor" tune in there as well, it reminded me of Symphony X or Liquid Tension Experiment, who i both love. Big ups for everything guys, seriously. For all the messages, comments, subs, fan art, donations, and support.

item.title: Weeping Angel Security Footage
item.description:
Weeping Angel Security Footage

Security Footage of Angels getting closer and closer....

item.title: Jupiter Descending
item.description:
Jupiter Descending

If you did fall into Jupiter's atmosphere in a submarine, what would it actually look like? What would you see before you melted or burned up? -Ada Munroe We don't know! We've only flown spacecraft into a gas planet's atmosphere twice (both Jupiter).

item.title: Hardball Questions For The Next Debate
item.description:
Hardball Questions For The Next Debate

One of your most important achievements as a neurosurgeon was inventing the functional hemispherectomy, a treatment for epilepsy in which the epileptic hemisphere of the brain is severed from the healthy hemisphere and the body, allowing the healthy hemisphere to have full control of the body free from any epileptic interference.

item.title: Storm Bunny Studios
item.description:
Storm Bunny Studios

Creators of the Rhune: Dawn of Twilight campaing setting - a fantasy fusion of northern ideas and steampunk sensibilities - best defined as stormpunk.
